channel.title: Team on NeuralSpikeAI
channel.description: Recent content in Team on NeuralSpikeAI

item.title: Michal Koperski
item.description: PhD in Machine Learning and Computer Vision from INRIA. The PhD was funded by Toyota Robotics. Intern at Disney Resarch lab at CMU. Over 13 years of experience in developing complex AI algorithms. Michal specializes in various computer vision solutions including recognition, detection, and segmentation. As well as classical ML algorithms.

item.title: Tomasz Konopczy≈Ñski
item.description: PhD in AI from Heidelberg University. Over 10 years of commercial experience in developing AI solutions. Tomasz has vast experience in medical images recognition, detection, and segmentation.
